sense.gloss: form of punishment in which a person is forced to walk on an oiled pipe over a charcoal fire (ancient China)
to be branded a ..., to be labelled a ...
bouffant cloth cap (traditionally worn by elders and monks)

sdata.j: ↑党↑↓とう↓の↑主↑↓おも↓な↑方針↑↓ほうしん↓を↑守↑↓まも↓らない↑政治↑↓せいじ↓↑家↑↓か↓は、だれしも↑反逆↑↓はんぎゃく↓↑分子↑↓ぶんし↓として、↑烙印↑↓らくいん↓を↑押↑↓お↓されるだろう。
sdata.e: Any politician who does not toe the main party line would be branded a renegade.

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓らは↑急進↑↓きゅうしん↓↑派↑↓は↓の↑烙印↑↓らくいん↓を↑押↑↓お↓された。
